Are you ready for a rebellion?  It's not going to be easy, it is going to require the painful tearing apart of what you thought you knew.  Start with being True to yourself.  This is the tallest order.  We lie to ourselves all the time, rationalize, deflect.  Feel comfort that everyone does it, but start cutting it out of your life one little white lie at a time.  I am committed to moving forward and doing the same.  A little scary, but required to find out what you are really capable of in this big world.

CPO (Chief People Officer) Guiding the Work that Helps People to Find Their Awesomeness

So thrilled to be part of the Campus Logic team! With exceptional leadership and a high growth mindset, we are taking the world of Financial Aid by storm to ensure that it is Awesome for everyone that touches the process.

Blog dedicated to changing the the practice, perception and impact of the People function.  Through 20 years in 6 start up companies and 1 fortune 50 organization, lessons learned and more than a few crazy incidents.

The world of HR needs a shake up.  The practice is not keeping up with the needs of business and is seen as an obstacle instead of leading solutions.  Some of us know the truth...the very essence of business is Culture.  That is what defines our world and our work.  Build great cultures and you will grow the business.

Videoloco started as a Video company, and today our process as a Digital Content Agency reflects our heritage.  V: Vision I: Insight D: Design E: Execute O: Optimize.  From our proprietary process that creates transparency for our clients.  Videoloco focuses on Product and Service Offerings, while our newest brand, eevoz, is focused on internal communication.  Both teams use our lean process model to provide the highest return on investment while containing costs and focusing on business oriented outcomes.In the world today, employment brand is dead.  Employee Voice, or eevoz, is what we have today.  Our team has over 75 years of experience working inside companies for internal communication, cultural alignment, engagement and a strong base of values.  We engage with organizations of all sizes to create a fully wrapped employee value proposition by capturing and reflecting employee voice.
Bio continues to grow in presence in AZ.  We work to Discover, Develop and Deliver for the industry by providing recognition, tools and community.

As a professional in Human Resources, I have worked closely with technology departments in all of my roles.  Bob has created and developed a team that is excellent at what they do.  More importantly, he has managed to find talent and mentor in way where they are engaging, outgoing and true partners to the business.  Bob has the unique ability to blend a strong knowledge of technology with a larger sense of business need and future business drivers.  He is able to anticipate and plan in a way that ensures the technology is in place and ready when needed.Bob and I also sat on the Executive team together and his ideas and perspective reflected great insight and were valuable when making decisions on overall direction of the company.If you have the opportunity to work with Bob, consider yourself fortunate to be presented with a chance to partner with a strong business-minded leader who is engaging and a joy to work with each day.

summary: www.campuslogic.comStart-Up Life is the Life for MeAfter navigating through more start-ups than you can shake a stick at, I have landed again the middle of another amazing high growth organization that cares about culture, people, purpose and values.   CampusLogic is known for being an exceptional place to find your Awesomeness, as we help schools change lives.  Leading the People function is a great honor and an exceptional opportunity to work with a great team to build another successful AZ start-up.  The joy of cultivating talent, growing leadership and having an economic impact to AZ brings me great pride after spending much of my life here in the valley.Speaking of Voice...After 20 years of working in organizations to optimize the experience of employees to drive business and build companies with true purpose, I am painfully aware that we are need of a revolution.  staciemallen.com is a personal account of my experiences and how our team became a key catalyst for success with 6 start ups and one Fortune 5O company all experiencing explosive growth.    How does the practice stop focusing on creating tactical barriers and start igniting business?  This is where you can find more on where I am speaking, current writing both for publication and blog consumption and probably some video.  Let's get to Illumin8ingPart of our mission to shine the light on the convergence of culture and business, we decided to light it up here in the desert and launch the Illumin8az event series.  Here CEOs, Leaders, Culture Warriors and Entrepreneurs come together to talk about how to overcome the challenge of growing business while building a high performing culture.
name: Stacie (Rosenthal) Mallen
title: CPO/Author/Speaker/Illumin8ing the Intersection between Business and Culture
